name: Test Chamber Alpha
description:
Test Chamber Alpha.

You and your friend are a pair of scientific testing candidates, carefully selected to take part in human intelligence trials. For the glory of humanity, use your respective skillsets to clear as many chambers as possible.

Singleplayer Mode.

Game may be played in single player. In this mode, one player fulfills both Operator and Technician roles.

Multiplayer Mode.

Player 1 (The Operator):

WASD/Space: Move/Jump

F: Interact

X: Cancel

With Player 2's guidance, clear test chambers to achieve a high score.

The test is failed when a mistake is made, or when camera/backup camera batteries are depleted.

Player 2 (The Technician).

Using the attached manual, direct Player 1 through test chambers. Looking at Player 1's screen is not allowed.

Player 2 Operation Manual.
